《HKEx》- 01089 LEYOU TECH H - JOINT ANNOUNCEMENT
(1) PROPOSED TAKE PRIVATE OF
LEYOU TECHNOLOGIES HOLDINGS LIMITED
BY WAY OF A SCHEME OF ARRANGEMENT
UNDER SECTION 86 OF THE COMPANIES ACT
(2) EFFECTIVE DATE OF THE SCHEME
(3) OPTION OFFER BECOMING UNCONDITIONAL IN
ALL RESPECTS AND RESULTS OF THE OPTION OFFER
AND
(4) WITHDRAWAL OF LISTING OF
LEYOU TECHNOLOGIES HOLDINGS LIMITED
